what_would_you_read: What would you like to read next?
find_your_next_book: Find your next "I stayed up too late reading" book.
hero_1_paragraph: Share your recent reads with us! Whether it's fiction, fact, or a new favorite, your feedback matters and helps us build a better library for everyone.
hero_2_paragraph: We're committed to building a library that evolves with our readers. Every week, we add thoughtfully chosen books to ensure that our collection reflects the changing needs and interests of our community so there's always something new worth discovering!
cant_find_desired: Can't find what you are looking for?
contact_library_admin: If you cannot find what you are looking for, send our library admin's a personal message.
number_can_change: This number can change until placing order has been completed.
sign_in_to_review: Sign in to be able to leave a review.
no_reviews_for_book: There are currently no reviews for this book
help_others_by_reviewing: Help others find their adventure by reviewing your loan
fill_all_fields: All fields must be filled out
title: Title
question: Question
pending_response: Pending response from administration. Please be patient.
no_questions: All questions you submit will be shown here
